summary: A7J TOPUP system: wallet topups (bKash/Nagad) with admin approval, wallet-to-points conversion, points-to-diamonds topups, ad-based point earning, plus admin panel for approvals, transaction tracking, and conversion rate settings; redesign website with clean white/purple professional responsive theme.
architectural_notes: TxID must be validated as non-empty and unique to prevent duplicate topup submissions.
Topup requests stored with status flow (e.g., Pending → Admin Approved) before updating wallet balance.
Admin-controlled conversion rates for BDT→Points and Points→Diamonds.
known_issues: Build/implementation failed previously with an 'Unexpected AI error' and inability to implement the request; may require retry/simplification.

existing_features.title: Update the global visual theme to a clean professional look: pure white backgrounds, purple accent color #6C5CE7, clean sans-serif typography, consistent sizing/spacing, rounded corners, and soft shadows; remove any dark/gaming/arena styling and heavy gradients across the UI.

Redesign the header/navigation to match: logo on the left, nav links (Home, Add Money, Buy Points, Topup Diamonds, Earn Points), and a wallet balance display; keep the header fully responsive with a mobile menu.

Redesign the Home page hero section to be minimal and professional: white background, bold headline, small subtitle, and a clear call-to-action button labeled "Add Money" that routes to the Add Money flow.

Update all card/section styling used on landing and core pages to use rounded corners, soft shadows, and a white/light-gray palette (no gradient card backgrounds); ensure spacing and layout remain mobile responsive.
Redesign the footer to a light gray background with clear sections for contact info, social links, and terms; keep it responsive and professional.

new_feature_requests.summary: Wallet topup via bKash/Nagad with TxID submission, validation (non-empty/unique), pending status, admin approval, user notifications, and wallet balance dashboard display
Points system: buy points using wallet at 3 BDT = 1 point with automatic wallet deduction, transaction history, duplicate submission prevention, and optional admin approval for point purchases
Diamond topup using points: spend points on diamond packages (e.g., 69 points = 100 diamonds) and credit diamonds after deduction
Earn points by watching ads (+1 point per ad) with optional daily limits and admin profit tracking
Admin panel: approve wallet topups (and point purchases if manual), view wallet/points/diamonds/ads transactions, and set conversion rates (BDT→Points, Points→Diamonds)

Website redesign: clean professional UI with pure white background, purple accent (#6C5CE7), responsive header/nav (Home/Add Money/Buy Points/Topup Diamonds/Earn Points) with wallet balance, hero CTA, light-gray footer, rounded cards with soft shadows, clean sans-serif typography, remove dark/gaming/gradient style
